alert.note: Alert for Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Saratoga; Southern Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 25 at 9:15PM EST until December 26 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility of a quarter-mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In New York, Saratoga, Warren, and Washington Counties. In Vermont, Windham County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Visibilities may rapidly change over short distances. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of dense fog will impact portions of Interstate 87, the Adirondack Northway, in Saratoga and Warren Counties in New York, and Interstate 91 in Windham County Vermont.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Saratoga; Southern Washington
